CMessie.cpp

00001 #include "CMessie.h"
00002 
00003 // Nessie (in ep3) (on the world map)
00004 enum nessie_actions{
00005  NESSIE_SWIMNORMAL, NESSIE_PAUSE
00006 };
00007 
00008 #define NESSIE_PAUSE_TIME       250
00009 
00010 #define NESSIE_ANIM_RATE        4
00011 
00012 #define NESSIE_DOWNLEFT_FRAME   130
00013 #define NESSIE_DOWNRIGHT_FRAME  132
00014 #define NESSIE_UPRIGHT_FRAME    134
00015 #define NESSIE_UPLEFT_FRAME     136
00016 
00017 #define NESSIE_SPEED            32
00018 
00019 void nessie_find_next_checkpoint(int o);
00020 
00021 CMessie::CMessie(CMap *p_map, Uint32 x, Uint32 y,
00022   std::vector<CPlayer>& Player) :
00023 CObject(p_map, x, y, OBJ_MESSIE),
00024 m_direction(LEFTDOWN),
00025 m_Player(Player)
00026 {
00027  onscreen = true;
00028  solid = false;
00029 
00030  baseframe = NESSIE_DOWNLEFT_FRAME;
00031 
00032  animframe = 0;
00033  animtimer = 0;
00034  state = NESSIE_SWIMNORMAL;
00035  pausetimer = 0;
00036  mortimer_swim_amt = 0;
00037  destx = 0;
00038  desty = 0;
00039  inhibitfall = 1;
00040  canbezapped = 0;
00041  needinit = 0;
00042 
00043  for(size_t i=0;i<=NESSIETRAILLEN;i++)
00044  {
00045   tiletrailX[i] = 0;
00046   tiletrailY[i] = 0;
00047  }
00048  // kick nessie into going counter-clockwise
00049  // (otherwise she'll go clockwise)
00050  int mx, my;
00051  mx = getXPosition()>>CSF;
00052  my = getYPosition()>>CSF;
00053  tiletrailX[0] = mx;
00054  tiletrailY[0] = my;
00055  tiletrailX[1] = mx+1;
00056  tiletrailY[1] = my;
00057  tiletrailhead = 2;
00058 
00059  for(size_t i=0;i<MAX_PLAYERS;i++)
00060  {
00061   mounted[i] = false;
00062  }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void CMessie::process()
00066 {
00067  // find out if nessie is mounted, and for all players that are
00068  // mounted keep them stuck to nessie
00069  bool isMounted = false;
00070 
00071  if(destx == 0 && desty == 0)
00072   nessie_find_next_checkpoint();
00073 
00074  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00075  for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00076  {
00077   if (mounted[it_player->m_index])
00078   {
00079    it_player->moveTo(x, y);
00080    isMounted = true;
00081   }
00082  }
00083 
00084  // animation
00085  sprite = baseframe + animframe;
00086  if (isMounted) sprite += 8;
00087 
00088  if (animtimer > NESSIE_ANIM_RATE)
00089  {
00090   animframe ^= 1;
00091   animtimer = 0;
00092  }
00093  else animtimer++;
00094 
00095  switch(state)
00096  {
00097  case NESSIE_SWIMNORMAL:
00098   // arrived at destination?
00099   if ( x > (destx-NESSIE_SPEED/2)  &&
00100     x < (destx+NESSIE_SPEED/2) )
00101   {
00102    if ( y > (desty-NESSIE_SPEED/2)  &&
00103      y < (desty+NESSIE_SPEED/2) )
00104    {
00105     nessie_find_next_checkpoint();
00106 
00107     // set up/down and left/right direction flags for frame selection
00108     bool goleft = (destx < x);
00109     bool godown = (desty > y);
00110 
00111     if(goleft && !godown)
00112      m_direction = LEFTUP;
00113     else if(goleft && godown)
00114      m_direction = LEFTDOWN;
00115     else if(!goleft && !godown)
00116      m_direction = RIGHTUP;
00117     else if(!goleft && godown)
00118      m_direction = RIGHTDOWN;
00119    }
00120   }
00121   move_nessie();
00122   break;
00123  case NESSIE_PAUSE:
00124   if(pausetimer)
00125   {
00126    pausetimer--;
00127   }
00128   else
00129   {
00130    state = NESSIE_SWIMNORMAL;
00131    move_nessie();
00132   }
00133   break;
00134  }
00135 }
00136 
00137 void CMessie::move_nessie()
00138 {
00139  // select proper frame based on up/down and left/right direction flags
00140  if (m_direction == LEFTDOWN)
00141   baseframe = NESSIE_DOWNLEFT_FRAME;
00142  else if (m_direction == RIGHTDOWN)
00143   baseframe = NESSIE_DOWNRIGHT_FRAME;
00144  else if (m_direction == LEFTUP)
00145   baseframe = NESSIE_UPLEFT_FRAME;
00146  else if (m_direction == RIGHTUP)
00147   baseframe = NESSIE_UPRIGHT_FRAME;
00148 
00149  // head to destination
00150  if (x < destx)
00151   moveRight(NESSIE_SPEED);
00152  else if (x > destx)
00153   moveLeft(NESSIE_SPEED);
00154 
00155  if (y < desty)
00156   moveDown(NESSIE_SPEED);
00157  else if (y > desty)
00158   moveUp(NESSIE_SPEED);
00159 }
00160 
00161 void CMessie::nessie_find_next_checkpoint()
00162 {
00163  int x,y,i;
00164  int xa,ya;
00165  unsigned int destx, desty;
00166 
00167  // search in the 8 surrounding tiles and head to the first pathtile
00168  // we find that's not one of the last 5 we've been to
00169 
00170  x = ((getXPosition())>>CSF)-1;
00171  y = ((getYPosition()+(8<<STC))>>CSF)-1;
00172 
00173  destx = desty = 0;
00174 
00175  for(ya=0;ya<3;ya++)
00176  {
00177   for(xa=0;xa<3;xa++)
00178   {
00179    destx = x+xa;
00180    desty = y+ya;
00181 
00182    int obj = mp_Map->getObjectat(destx, desty);
00183    if (obj==NESSIE_PATH || obj==NESSIE_WEED)
00184    {
00185     // find out if this is one of the last tiles we've been to
00186     bool oneoflasttiles = false;
00187     for(i=0;i<NESSIETRAILLEN;i++)
00188     {
00189      if (tiletrailX[i]==destx &&
00190        tiletrailY[i]==desty)
00191      {
00192       oneoflasttiles = true;
00193       break;
00194      }
00195     }
00196 
00197     if (!oneoflasttiles)
00198     {
00199      tiletrailX[tiletrailhead] = destx;
00200      tiletrailY[tiletrailhead] = desty;
00201      tiletrailhead++;
00202      if (tiletrailhead>=NESSIETRAILLEN)
00203      {
00204       tiletrailhead = 0;
00205      }
00206      goto foundtile;
00207     } // end if (!oneoflasttiles)
00208    }  // end if(obj==8192 ...
00209 
00210   } // end for(xa...
00211  } // end for(ya...
00212 
00213  // If Nessie went to an dead end. Go back!
00214  tiletrailhead = 0;
00215  return;
00216 
00217  foundtile: ;
00218 
00219  this->destx = (destx<<CSF);
00220  this->desty = (desty<<CSF)-(8<<STC);
00221 
00222  int obj = mp_Map->getObjectat(destx, desty);
00223  if(obj == NESSIE_WEED || obj == NESSIE_LAND)
00224  {
00225   state = NESSIE_PAUSE;
00226   pausetimer = NESSIE_PAUSE_TIME;
00227  }
00228 }
